docs.text: Billeroo (BR) API v1.2 Introduction The purpose of this document is to provide the procedures in using the Billeroo (BR) API. The services covered for Billeroo will be as follows: Biller Service Bills Payment Service Bills Payment Status Service BR API (Application Programming Interface) allows integrators to process and pay bills to partner billers. Getting Started To integrate, integrator receives credentials to connect with the API. Parameter Description Type Authorization Unique identifier of integrator String Info It is recommended to keep the credentials private and secure, especially the LIVE credentials
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: The purpose of this document is to provide the procedures in using the Billeroo (BR) API. The services covered for Billeroo will be as follows: Biller Service Bills Payment Service Bills Payment Status Service BR API (Application Programming Interface) allows integrators to process and pay bills to partner billers.
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: To integrate, integrator receives credentials to connect with the API. Parameter Description Type Authorization Unique identifier of integrator String Info It is recommended to keep the credentials private and secure, especially the LIVE credentials
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: API Reference This reference section provides in depth integration details. Environments There are two environments: TEST and LIVE Environment URL TEST http://test-api.billeroo.com/ LIVE https://api.billeroo.com Response Messages Status Code Description Remarks OK.00.00 Payment Successful Status for a successful payment to biller Error Messages Status Code Description Remarks 401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Integrator will receive this error if an incorrect authorization is provided ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Duplicate Reference No. Integrator will receive this error if provided reference is already present or a duplicate. ER.00.00 Payment Failed. System Detects Double Transaction / Insufficient Balance. Integrator will receive this error if the account is low on balance or the amount to be paid has been used in a previous transaction ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Check the Account No. / Identifier or Invalid Amount. Integrator will receive this error if the account number provided does not match any existing account number on the selected biller or the amount to be paid does not meet the minimum amount to be paid to the selected biller. ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Invalid Amount / Check Amount Format Integrator will receive this error if amount entered is not of numeric format.
docs.title: API Reference

docs.text: This reference section provides in depth integration details.
docs.title: API Reference

docs.text: There are two environments: TEST and LIVE Environment URL TEST http://test-api.billeroo.com/ LIVE https://api.billeroo.com
docs.title: Environments

docs.text: Status Code Description Remarks OK.00.00 Payment Successful Status for a successful payment to biller
docs.title: Response Messages

docs.text: Status Code Description Remarks 401 Unauthorized Unauthorized Integrator will receive this error if an incorrect authorization is provided ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Duplicate Reference No. Integrator will receive this error if provided reference is already present or a duplicate. ER.00.00 Payment Failed. System Detects Double Transaction / Insufficient Balance. Integrator will receive this error if the account is low on balance or the amount to be paid has been used in a previous transaction ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Check the Account No. / Identifier or Invalid Amount. Integrator will receive this error if the account number provided does not match any existing account number on the selected biller or the amount to be paid does not meet the minimum amount to be paid to the selected biller. ER.00.00 Payment Failed. Invalid Amount / Check Amount Format Integrator will receive this error if amount entered is not of numeric format.
docs.title: Error Messages

docs.text: Generate Biller Reference Requirements An endpoint to get SSS specific biller requirements. To get biller requirements, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/biller/{code}/generate?customer={customerReference} Biller Reference Requirements Request Samples curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/{code}/generate?customer={customerReference}"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples Generate Biller Reference Requirements { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 06:50:02 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTU5NjIsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNDE2MiwianRpIjoiYzU3NTI4NGUtYzkwZS00NjM2LWIyODEtMTRjZWU5M2NmODkzIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.8yN-vwoPFOXKRXqQCsdPySV8DAZspu2_ZBuLPPPE1aY/generate" , "data" :{ "fields" :[ { "field" : "1" , "description" : "Member Type[1/2/4/5]" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "1" }, { "field" : "2" , "description" : "SS Number" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "10" }, { "field" : "3" , "description" : "Amount" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "12,2" }, { "field" : "4" , "description" : "Flexi-fund Amount" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "12,2" }, { "field" : "5" , "description" : "Applicable Start Month(MMYYYY)" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "6" }, { "field" : "6" , "description" : "Applicable End Month(MMYYYY)" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "6" } ], "notes" :[ { "note" : "1" , "description" : "Member Type Codes" , "value" : "1 - SE, 2 - VM, 4 - NWS, 5 - OFW" }, { "note" : "2" , "description" : "For flexi fund amount" , "value" : " Input parameter of flexi-fund amount is available. A member can pay flexi-fund only if he/she has an initial payment of max contribution on the same applicable month" }, { "note" : "3" , "description" : "Reminder" , "value" : "Flexi-fund Amount is an optional return for OFW transactions" }, { "note" : "4" , "description" : "Generate New or Change Amount/Applicable Months" , "value" : "When generating new PRN, include flexi-fund field. When changing amount/applicable month, exclude flexi-fund field" } ] } } Generate Biller Reference Requirements Erroneous Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 07:29:48 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTU5NjIsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNDE2MiwianRpIjoiYzU3NTI4NGUtYzkwZS00NjM2LWIyODEtMTRjZWU5M2NmODkzIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.8yN-vwoPFOXKRXqQCsdPySV8DAZspu2_ZBuLPPPE1aY/generate" }
docs.title: Generate Biller Reference Requirements

When changing amount/applicable month, exclude flexi-fund field" } ] } } Generate Biller Reference Requirements Erroneous Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 07:29:48 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTU5NjIsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNDE2MiwianRpIjoiYzU3NTI4NGUtYzkwZS00NjM2LWIyODEtMTRjZWU5M2NmODkzIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.8yN-vwoPFOXKRXqQCsdPySV8DAZspu2_ZBuLPPPE1aY/generate" }

docs.text: Generate Biller Reference An endpoint to generate payment reference number (PRN) for SSS biller. To generate PRN, send the following request header parameter via POST. POST/generate Generate Biller Reference Request Samples cURL curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/generate"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "biller": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTkxOTQsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNzM5NCwianRpIjoiYTkxMzhiOTAtYjJlNS00YTM3LWI3MTYtNTNiOTdiNzExZmNiIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.In7A3P8jUmEr86nEHQhZg5lW8D46QL32s4kQEaWE5jA", "fields": [ { "field": "1", "value": "2" }, { "field": "2", "value": "3401096966" }, { "field": "3", "value": "780" }, { "field": "5", "value": "112024" }, { "field": "6", "value": "122024" } ] }" 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples Generate Biller Reference { "timestamp" : "2021-12-06 02:56:31 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/generate" , "data" : { "reference" : "{reference}" , "message" : "Successfully generated" } } Generate Biller Reference Erroneous Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 07:29:48 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTU5NjIsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNDE2MiwianRpIjoiYzU3NTI4NGUtYzkwZS00NjM2LWIyODEtMTRjZWU5M2NmODkzIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.8yN-vwoPFOXKRXqQCsdPySV8DAZspu2_ZBuLPPPE1aY/generate" }
docs.title: Generate Biller Reference

docs.text: Get Biller Categories An endpoint to get all available biller categories. To get biller categories, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/biller/biller-category Biller Category Request Samples curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/biller-category" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response Response Samples { "timestamp" : "2021-06-29 07:12:27 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/biller-category" , "data" : [ { "code" : "{categoryCode}" , "value" : "{categoryName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" }, { "code" : "{categoryCode}" , "value" : "{categoryName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" } ] }
docs.title: Get Biller Categories

docs.text: An endpoint to get all available biller categories. To get biller categories, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/biller/biller-category
docs.title: Get Biller Categories

docs.text: curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/biller-category" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response
docs.title: Request Samples

docs.text: { "timestamp" : "2021-06-29 07:12:27 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/biller-category" , "data" : [ { "code" : "{categoryCode}" , "value" : "{categoryName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" }, { "code" : "{categoryCode}" , "value" : "{categoryName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" } ] }
docs.title: Response Samples

docs.text: Get Biller Reference Details An endpoint to get biller reference details. To get biller reference details, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/reference/{code}/{reference} Biller Reference Details Request Samples cURL curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/reference/{code}/{reference}"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples Get Biller Reference Details { "timestamp" : "2021-12-06 05:40:34 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/reference/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg3NzA0NjAsImlhdCI6MTYzODc2ODY2MCwianRpIjoiNjJhZGM5MmUtZTI2MS00OTY2LWJkNTUtZjFhYzJlNWQ5NWEyIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiZjdjZTc5ZGItODlmMC00N2UwLWFiMTAtNDg2OTU0MTQ2MmJjIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0._o5lweuxuvM3W-_4JUgsbfT7Y7S6VCgbcV_4BcmL284/VL210000305093" , "data" : { "details" : [ { "detail" : 1 , "description" : "Member Name" , "value" : "Juan Dela Cruz" }, { "detail" : 2 , "description" : "SS Number" , "value" : "3401010000" }, { "detail" : 3 , "description" : "Applicable Month(Start)" , "value" : "112021" }, { "detail" : 4 , "description" : "Applicable Month(End)" , "value" : "122021" }, { "detail" : 5 , "description" : "Total Amount" , "value" : "780.00" }, { "detail" : 6 , "description" : "Payment Reference Number" , "value" : "VL210000111111" } ] } } Get Biller Reference Details Erroneous Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-06 05:42:59 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/reference/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg3NzA0NjAsImlhdCI6MTYzODc2ODY2MCwianRpIjoiNjJhZGM5MmUtZTI2MS00OTY2LWJkNTUtZjFhYzJlNWQ5NWEyIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiZjdjZTc5ZGItODlmMC00N2UwLWFiMTAtNDg2OTU0MTQ2MmJjIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0._o5lweuxuvM3W-_4JUgsbfT7Y7S6VCgbcV_4BcmL284/VL210000111111" }

docs.text: Get Biller References An endpoint to get own biller references for SSS. To get biller references, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/biller/{code}/reference?customer={customerReference} Biller References Request Samples curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/{code}/reference?customer={customerReference}"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples Get Biller References Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 05:03:15 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MDk1MjgsImlhdCI6MTYzODUwNzcyOCwianRpIjoiZjAwZWQzMjMtMWUyNC00ZWU1LTliMTUtMTA0MWQ2YTdmMGQ1IiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.C8Rz7G-JjX-y3eU8HuNYsQVhkRkeG2T1xrDf_XrX-d0/reference" , "data" : [ { "billerReference" : "VL210000111111" , "notes" : [ { "note" : "1" , "description" : "Member Name" , "value" : "Cruz, Juan Dela" }, { "note" : "2" , "description" : "SS Number" , "value" : "3401010000" }, { "note" : "3" , "description" : "Amount" , "value" : "780.00" }, { "note" : "4" , "description" : "Applicable Month(Start)" , "value" : "112021" }, { "note" : "5" , "description" : "Applicable Month(End)" , "value" : "122021" } ] } ] } Get Biller References Erroneous Response { "timestamp" : "2021-12-03 07:31:06 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mzg1MTU5NjIsImlhdCI6MTYzODUxNDE2MiwianRpIjoiYzU3NTI4NGUtYzkwZS00NjM2LWIyODEtMTRjZWU5M2NmODkzIiwiYm5tIjoiU1NTIiwicGlkIjoiMWNmNTkyNTItMjg2Mi00MjM0LTgzZjEtMTFkZjZhNGMzZjBkIiwiYmlkIjoiU1NTIn0.8yN-vwoPFOXKRXqQCsdPySV8DAZspu2_ZBuLPPPE1aY/reference" }

docs.text: Get Biller Requirements An endpoint to get specific biller requirements. To get biller requirements, send the following request header parameter via GET. GET/biller/{jwtString} Biller Requirements Request Samples curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/{jwtString}"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response Response Samples { "timestamp" : "2021-06-29 08:18:50 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller" , "data" : { "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "description" : "12 Digit Account Number" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "12" }, { "field" : "2" , "description" : "ATM Reference Number" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "12" } ], "notes" : [ { "note" : "1" , "description" : "Convenience Fee" , "value" : "0.00" } ] } }
docs.title: Get Biller Requirements

docs.text: Get Billers An endpoint to get all available billers. To get billers, send the following request header parameter via GET. Get Billers GET/biller?detailed=false&expirable=true Get Detailed Billers GET/biller?detailed=true&expirable=true Billers Request Samples cURL curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller?detailed=false&expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ cURL Detailed curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller?detailed=true&expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response 200 Successful Response for Detailed Biller Response Samples Get Billers Response { "timestamp" : "2021-06-29 08:18:50 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller" , "data" : [ { "code" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{billerName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" }, { "code" : "{jwtString}" , "value" : "{billerName}" , "imageUrl" : "{ImageUrl}" } ] } Get Detailed Billers Response { "timestamp" : "2021-08-10 08:14:41 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller" , "data" : [ { "code" : "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2Mjg1ODUyOTgsImlhdCI6MTYyODU4MzQ5OCwianRpIjoiMTMzMjdlMWItMjZmMi00MWYyLThjOWMtNzUxZTVkZDk0Y2NiIiwicGlkIjoiMzA4YTVmOTQtMDZhNy00Mzc1LTk2MmItMTYzOWE2MDgyYTM2IiwiYmlkIjoiTUFOSUxBV0FURVIifQ.SWtvLsTvWwXPInumoY-5h19agdjXhi0ntUr3lvXTg_8" , "value" : "MANILA WATER COMPANY" , "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "description" : "8 Digit Contract Account Number" , "format" : "Numeric" , "size" : "8" }, { "field" : "2" , "description" : "Account Name" , "format" : "Alphanumeric" , "size" : "30" } ], "notes" : [ { "note" : "1" , "description" : "Convenience Fee" , "value" : "0.00" } ] } ], "imageUrl" : "https://d23soho40yp0cc.cloudfront.net/static/img/logo-bc/logo-bc-water.png" }
docs.title: Get Billers

docs.text: An endpoint to get all available billers. To get billers, send the following request header parameter via GET. Get Billers GET/biller?detailed=false&expirable=true Get Detailed Billers GET/biller?detailed=true&expirable=true

docs.text: cURL curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller?detailed=false&expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ cURL Detailed curl -X GET "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller?detailed=true&expirable=true" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ 200 Successful Response 200 Successful Response for Detailed Biller

docs.text: Validate Biller Reference Endpoint that will allow integrator to validate reference to the biller. Depending on the biller to be used, to validate biller reference, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/validate Biller Reference Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/validate"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "biller":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9. eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKS BBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vICh CUikiLCJleHAiOjE2MjUwMzM1MjAsImlhdCI6MTYyNTAzM TcyMCwianRpIjoiZmYyZmM4ZjctYzUxNS00YWZiLTk3NTQ tMzZiZWIyZmIwOGYzIiwicGlkIjoiODIzYzBhMmQtYmU2Y y00NzcyLTg0MTQtM2Y3NzY4ZGRkYTU5IiwiYmlkIjoiUFJ JTUVXQVRFUiJ9.LsHypt5VVPUyybQDqvxeF65KvRRWRulb n91uRYPz5Uw", "fields": [ { "field": "1", "value": "{accountNumber}" }, { "field": "2", "value": "{identifier}" }, { "field": "3", "value": "{amount}" } ] }" Payload { "biller" : "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9. eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKS BBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vICh CUikiLCJleHAiOjE2MjUwMzM1MjAsImlhdCI6MTYyNTAzM TcyMCwianRpIjoiZmYyZmM4ZjctYzUxNS00YWZiLTk3NTQ tMzZiZWIyZmIwOGYzIiwicGlkIjoiODIzYzBhMmQtYmU2Y y00NzcyLTg0MTQtM2Y3NzY4ZGRkYTU5IiwiYmlkIjoiUFJ JTUVXQVRFUiJ9.LsHypt5VVPUyybQDqvxeF65KvRRWRulb n91uRYPz5Uw" , "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "value" : "{accountNumber}" }, { "field" : "2" , "value" : "{identifier}" }, { "field" : "3" , "value" : "{amount}" } ] } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 05:45:02 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/validate" , "data" : { "valid" : true , "message" : "PRIMEWATER" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 08:31:05 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/validate" }
docs.title: Validate Biller Reference

docs.text: Endpoint that will allow integrator to validate reference to the biller. Depending on the biller to be used, to validate biller reference, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/validate

docs.text: cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/biller/validate"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "biller":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9. eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKS BBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vICh CUikiLCJleHAiOjE2MjUwMzM1MjAsImlhdCI6MTYyNTAzM TcyMCwianRpIjoiZmYyZmM4ZjctYzUxNS00YWZiLTk3NTQ tMzZiZWIyZmIwOGYzIiwicGlkIjoiODIzYzBhMmQtYmU2Y y00NzcyLTg0MTQtM2Y3NzY4ZGRkYTU5IiwiYmlkIjoiUFJ JTUVXQVRFUiJ9.LsHypt5VVPUyybQDqvxeF65KvRRWRulb n91uRYPz5Uw", "fields": [ { "field": "1", "value": "{accountNumber}" }, { "field": "2", "value": "{identifier}" }, { "field": "3", "value": "{amount}" } ] }" Payload { "biller" : "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9. eyJpc3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKS BBBdXRoZW50aWNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vICh CUikiLCJleHAiOjE2MjUwMzM1MjAsImlhdCI6MTYyNTAzM TcyMCwianRpIjoiZmYyZmM4ZjctYzUxNS00YWZiLTk3NTQ tMzZiZWIyZmIwOGYzIiwicGlkIjoiODIzYzBhMmQtYmU2Y y00NzcyLTg0MTQtM2Y3NzY4ZGRkYTU5IiwiYmlkIjoiUFJ JTUVXQVRFUiJ9.LsHypt5VVPUyybQDqvxeF65KvRRWRulb n91uRYPz5Uw" , "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "value" : "{accountNumber}" }, { "field" : "2" , "value" : "{identifier}" }, { "field" : "3" , "value" : "{amount}" } ] } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response

docs.text: 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 05:45:02 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/biller/validate" , "data" : { "valid" : true , "message" : "PRIMEWATER" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 08:31:05 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/biller/validate" }

docs.text: Get Bills Payment Status To get bills payment status from the biller, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/status Bills Payment Status Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/status"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "reference": "2AAA9C81E1D0" }" Payload { "reference" : "2AAA9C81E1D0" } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 09:02:59 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/status" , "data" : { "statusCode" : "OK.00.00" , "statusDescription" : "Payment Successful" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 12:08:05 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/status" }
docs.title: Get Bills Payment Status

docs.text: To get bills payment status from the biller, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/status

docs.text: cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/status"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "reference": "2AAA9C81E1D0" }" Payload { "reference" : "2AAA9C81E1D0" } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response

docs.text: Pay Bills Depending on the biller to be used, to pay bills, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/pay Pay Bills Request Samples cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/pay"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "merchantReference": "MERABC0200", "biller":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc 3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50a WNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2M jc2MjcxNTgsImlhdCI6MTYyNzYyNTM1OCwianRpIjoiOTNiYTk2N 2UtZmEwMi00NmIwLWE2MDAtNzJlMjgyYzU3YjBkIiwicGlkIjoiZ WZkN2JmMjQtMzkxNi00Y2VhLThkZGItZGM3YTA3OTg2YzA5IiwiY mlkIjoiTUFOSUxBV0FURVIifQ.u78rbBkSbISfJgM0fFST7cXQ7h O1_OBYUQPgIOORjOk", "fields": [ { "field": "1", "value": "{accountNumber}" }, { "field": "2", "value": "{identifier}" }, { "field": "3", "value": "{amount}" } ] }" Payload { "merchantReference" : "MERABC0200" , "biller" : "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc 3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50a WNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2M jc2MjcxNTgsImlhdCI6MTYyNzYyNTM1OCwianRpIjoiOTNiYTk2N 2UtZmEwMi00NmIwLWE2MDAtNzJlMjgyYzU3YjBkIiwicGlkIjoiZ WZkN2JmMjQtMzkxNi00Y2VhLThkZGItZGM3YTA3OTg2YzA5IiwiY mlkIjoiTUFOSUxBV0FURVIifQ.u78rbBkSbISfJgM0fFST7cXQ7h O1_OBYUQPgIOORjOk" , "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "value" : "{accountNumber}" }, { "field" : "2" , "value" : "{identifier}" }, { "field" : "3" , "value" : "{amount}" } ] } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response Response Samples 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 07:09:42 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/pay" , "data" : { "reference" : "674FE281014A" , "statusDescription" : "Payment Successful" , "statusCode" : "OK.00.00" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 08:26:06 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/pay" }

docs.text: Depending on the biller to be used, to pay bills, send the request headers and body parameters via POST. POST/pay
docs.title: Pay Bills

docs.text: cURL curl -X POST "http://test-api.billeroo.com/pay"\ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "Authorization: {integratorToken}" \ -d "{ "merchantReference": "MERABC0200", "biller":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc 3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50a WNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2M jc2MjcxNTgsImlhdCI6MTYyNzYyNTM1OCwianRpIjoiOTNiYTk2N 2UtZmEwMi00NmIwLWE2MDAtNzJlMjgyYzU3YjBkIiwicGlkIjoiZ WZkN2JmMjQtMzkxNi00Y2VhLThkZGItZGM3YTA3OTg2YzA5IiwiY mlkIjoiTUFOSUxBV0FURVIifQ.u78rbBkSbISfJgM0fFST7cXQ7h O1_OBYUQPgIOORjOk", "fields": [ { "field": "1", "value": "{accountNumber}" }, { "field": "2", "value": "{identifier}" }, { "field": "3", "value": "{amount}" } ] }" Payload { "merchantReference" : "MERABC0200" , "biller" : "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc 3MiOiJUTFBFIiwic3ViIjoiQmlsbGVyb28gKEJSKSBBdXRoZW50a WNhdGlvbiIsImF1ZCI6IkJpbGxlcm9vIChCUikiLCJleHAiOjE2M jc2MjcxNTgsImlhdCI6MTYyNzYyNTM1OCwianRpIjoiOTNiYTk2N 2UtZmEwMi00NmIwLWE2MDAtNzJlMjgyYzU3YjBkIiwicGlkIjoiZ WZkN2JmMjQtMzkxNi00Y2VhLThkZGItZGM3YTA3OTg2YzA5IiwiY mlkIjoiTUFOSUxBV0FURVIifQ.u78rbBkSbISfJgM0fFST7cXQ7h O1_OBYUQPgIOORjOk" , "fields" : [ { "field" : "1" , "value" : "{accountNumber}" }, { "field" : "2" , "value" : "{identifier}" }, { "field" : "3" , "value" : "{amount}" } ] } 200 Successful Response 401 Erroneous Response
docs.title: Request Samples

docs.text: 200 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 07:09:42 +0000" , "status" : 200 , "message" : "OK" , "path" : "/pay" , "data" : { "reference" : "674FE281014A" , "statusDescription" : "Payment Successful" , "statusCode" : "OK.00.00" } } 401 { "timestamp" : "2021-06-30 08:26:06 +0000" , "status" : 401 , "error" : "Unauthorized" , "path" : "/pay" }
